title: How to Make Rhubarb Cream

steps.headline: Wash the rhubarb and cut it into small pieces.
Cook the rhubarb with a small amount of water or apple juice.
steps.description: Press the cooked rhubarb through a sieve, mouli, or blend it.

steps.headline: Place the rhubarb into a mixing bowl.
steps.description: Add the honey, lemon peel and cinnamon. Leave to cool.

steps.headline: Beat the egg yolks and add to the rhubarb mixture and mix well.
Beat the egg whites until they become stiff and fold them in gently to the mixture.

text: Wash the rhubarb and cut it into small pieces.  Cook the rhubarb with a small amount of water or apple juice. Press the cooked rhubarb through a sieve, mouli, or blend it. Place the rhubarb into a mixing bowl. Add the honey, lemon peel and cinnamon. Leave to cool. Beat the egg yolks and add to the rhubarb mixture and mix well.  Beat the egg whites until they become stiff and fold them in gently to the mixture.  Serve chilled in parfait glasses.
